# cmccloudv2_snapshot (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `is_latest` (Boolean) true if you want to get the latest snapshot that match other filter
- `name` (String) Filter by name of snapshot (case-insenitive)
- `snapshot_id` (String) Id of the snapshot
- `status` (String) Filter by status of snapshot (case-insenitive), match exactly
- `volume_id` (String) Id of the volume

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `real_size_gb` (Number)
